[Groovy] Class DateAndTimeDateEditor

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.binding.StructuredPropertyEditor
class DateAndTimeDateEditor
extends org.springframework.beans.propertyeditors.CustomDateEditor

Structured editor for editing dates that takes 1 date field and two for hour and minute and constructs a Date instance Adapted from code by Graeme Rocher in Grails coreStructuredDateEditor
